mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hemoglobinometer
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Queen-Gray Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contains two parts in a leather case. Inside sticker reads: "This certifies that Dare Hemoglobinometer No. 2285 has been examined and approved." Sticker is signed by Arthur Dare and dated January 15, 1913." Gold imprint on the top of the box.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
Donated by J. T. Thorton, Jr. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
